headline: Constellation Energy (CEG) Appoints New Chief Nuclear Officer Chris Mudrick
summary: Constellation Energy (CEG) recently experienced a price move of 6% over the last quarter, during which several key events occurred. Chris Mudrick's appointment as Chief Nuclear Officer, succeeding Dave Rhoades, marks an important leadership transition, potentially impacting nuclear operations. Additionally, the company's Q2 earnings report showed a revenue increase to $6,101 million and a slight rise in net income, while share repurchases of over one million shares were executed. These...

headline: How Is Constellation Energy Accelerating Growth Through PPAs?
summary: CEG focuses on power purchase agreements to support its objective of providing carbon-free energy.

headline: Industry Veteran Chris Mudrick Selected to Lead America’s Largest Nuclear Fleet, Succeeding Dave Rhoades
summary: BALTIMORE, September 04, 2025--Constellation named Chris Mudrick as the company's new chief nuclear officer, succeeding Dave Rhoades, who is retiring at the end of the year.
